description: Clinical data model defining initial state templates for ophthalmology consultations

notes.purpose: Defines initial empty state for consultation shared data. Episodes are created dynamically with operational fields (episode_id, questions_answered, follow_up_blocks) and do not need a template here.
notes.usage: State Manager loads this file once at initialization and deep-copies the shared_data_template for each new consultation.
notes.arrays: past_medical_history, medications, family_history, and allergies start as empty arrays. Items are appended as they are collected.
notes.nested_objects: social_history and systems_review have pre-defined structure to prevent field name inconsistencies.
notes.systems_review_status: Only general_health is fully defined. Other systems (neurological, ENT, etc.) are placeholders to be populated when those sections are implemented.
